attributes.action: ensure that Britain's Service Personnel working in Afghanistan receive all their entitlements Tax Free.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British Forces working in Afghanistan are the ONLY personnel that have to pay tax on their incomes and entitlements whilst they are away representing their Country. US and European Forces serving in the Afghanistan theatre do not pay ANY taxes from when they set foot in the country until they return to their own. This is NOT acceptable, and the British Government should fall in line with other coalition countries.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
